channel.title: Migrations overview on KittyORM: Fast and reliable ORM for SQLite\Android
channel.description: Recent content in Migrations overview on KittyORM: Fast and reliable ORM for SQLite\Android

item.title: DB schema
item.description: Create schema script generated by KittyORM for database mig version 1 CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mig_one (id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY ASC, creation_date TEXT NOT NULL, some_integer INTEGER); Drop schema script generated by KittyORM for database mig version 1 DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mig_one;

item.title: Source code
item.description: KittyORM mig v.1 implementation sources Click to view MigrationDBv1.class: 1@KITTY_DATABASE( 2 isLoggingOn = true, 3 isProductionOn = false, 4 databaseName = "mig", 5 databaseVersion = 1, 6 logTag = MigrationDBv1.LTAG, 7 domainPackageNames = {"net.akaish.kittyormdemo.sqlite.migrations.migv1"} 8) 9@KITTY_DATABASE_REGISTRY( 10 domainModels = {net.akaish.kittyormdemo.sqlite.migrations.migv1.MigOneModel.class} 11) 12public class MigrationDBv1 extends KittyDatabase { 13 14 public static final String LTAG = "MIGv1"; 15 16 /** 17* KittyORM main database class that represents bootstrap and holder for all related with database 18* components.
